Description: The top level WRC+ class which now is anticipating NGRC1, equipped with H4DPA 1.6L i4 engine, 2.5 bar anti-lag turbo with 36mm restrictor, active center differential with hydrualic shaft disengage mechanism and 6-speed sequential transmission. After development the 2021 generation has multiple VO parts for different situations. Tarmac spec has around 200mm of suspension travel and 370mm brake discs.
